title: Ep. 567 - The M-Word
description:
Lots of people get accused of saying the “n-word,” but only some get punished for it. A prominent BLM activist calls for vandalism of churches. And AOC steps in a racial minefield.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
